ALTDESIGN:
Create two 2/2 white Cat **Gymbro** creature tokens. Then search your library for a legendary creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Until end of turn, if a creature entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time. Exile the top five cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among the exiled cards onto the battlefield.
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Cat Soldier creature token. If that token entering the battlefield causes an ability of a permanent you control to trigger this turn, that ability triggers an additional time.
